org.primaresearch.clc.phd.repository

Class FileFolderWorkflowRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.clc.phd.repository.FileFolderWorkflowRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkflowRepository

    public class FileFolderWorkflowRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkflowRepository
    A simple repository implementation that reads all XML workflow files from a specified disk folder.
    Author:
    clc
